rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows to allow natural light, following Scandinavian minimalist design. Positioned towards the east for positive energy.
Compact dining area integrated within the living space for a seamless flow. North alignment to promote balance.
Functional kitchen with energy-efficient layout and floor-to-ceiling windows for ventilation, aligned towards the south as per Vastu.
Cozy bedroom with ample space for family of four; minimalistic decor and floor-to-ceiling windows to maintain Scandinavian style.
Small balcony integrated with the living area to maximize space on an irregular plot.

openings.description: Large floor-to-ceiling window enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Main entrance door designed to comply with local norms and facilitate smooth flow.

notes: This plan adheres to Scandinavian minimalist design principles, ensures maximum utilization of space on an irregular plot, and incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced natural lighting. The layout respects local building norms and Vastu guidelines by aligning key rooms with specific cardinal directions.
